title: I don't understand the point of the LeaverBuster.

replies.body:
>after putting 4 years into this game with so much RP spent why should it be thrown away in under a month

This means nothing; don't use that as an argument.

Leavebuster cannot tell the difference between your being disconnected from the game by crashing or you being disconnected by purposefully leaving. To it, it's both one and the same. If you're having such severe connection issues or random crashing issues, then don't play public game modes until you fix it. A part of the agreement which you signed includes the fact that you are wholly responsible for your connection - if it's faulty then you are the one who needs to fix it, not Riot.
